summary: Innovative and detail-oriented Software Engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and a passion for developing scalable web applications. Eager to leverage skills in Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies to solve complex problems and contribute to a forward-thinking team. A quick learner dedicated to continuous skill development and keeping up with the latest industry trends.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a client-facing web portal using Django and React. Collaborated with a team of 5 to implement new features, write unit tests, and resolve bugs, improving application performance by 10%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with a CGPA of 8.9/10. Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Operating Systems.

projects.name: AI Career Advisor Prototype
projects.description: Led the backend development for a Flask-based web application that provides personalized career recommendations using a rule-based engine and integrates with Google's Gemini API for an AI-powered chatbot.
